dialogue_turns.speaker: user
dialogue_turns.text: An email from Peter in Bratislava, who says, 'As a Slovak businessman, I'm thrilled to hear about the growing ties with Kazakhstan.'

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: President Tokayev and Prime Minister Fico meeting in Akorda, that's a pretty significant visit, right?

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev held talks with Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico during his official visit to Kazakhstan, citing Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. And Tokayev mentioned, uh, that Slovakia is seen as a key partner within the EU for Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. And Tokayev mentioned, uh, that Slovakia is seen as a key partner within the E U for Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We highly value our relations with Slovakia and see your country as one of Kazakhstan's key partners within the European Union.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he really emphasized untapped opportunities—like there's still so much potential for joint projects between the two.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he really emphasized untapped opportunities-like there's still so much potential for joint projects between the two.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I believe there are still untapped opportunities worth exploring.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And Fico's response was interesting too—he pointed out there are no political disagreements, which is kinda rare these days.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And Fico's response was interesting too-he pointed out there are no political disagreements, which is kinda rare these days.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I would like to emphasize that there are no political disagreements between our countries, which allows us to fully focus on developing mutually beneficial economic relations and friendship.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so they can just focus on, like, economic cooperation without any of those usual hurdles.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so they can just focus on, like, economic cooperation without any of those usual hurdles.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I would like to emphasize that there are no political disagreements between our countries, which allows us to fully focus on developing mutually beneficial economic relations and friendship.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, he said they'd be discussing promising projects today, and he's confident it'll lead to successful results.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, he said they'd be discussing promising projects today, and he's confident it'll lead to successful results.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Today, we will discuss several important and promising projects for both sides. I am confident that this visit will produce successful results, Fico said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's cool to see smaller EU nations building such strong bilateral ties outside the usual big players.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's cool to see smaller E U nations building such strong bilateral ties outside the usual big players.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And you know, the fact that Fico was received with honors at Akorda shows how much importance Kazakhstan places on this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And you know, the fact that Fico was received with honors at Akorda shows how much importance Kazakhstan places on this.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely sets a positive tone. I'm curious what those major joint projects they're already implementing actually are.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely sets a positive tone. I'm curious what those major joint projects they're already implementing actually are.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are implementing major joint projects.

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, me too. Infrastructure, energy maybe? Slovakia has some expertise there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Could be. And Tokayev did say he'd do everything possible to expand cooperation across various sectors.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As President, I will do everything possible to further expand and strengthen our cooperation across various sectors, Tokayev said during the meeting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds like both sides are really committed. Hopefully we hear more concrete outcomes soon.
